h2&#123;font-size:20px&#125;.markdown-body h3&#123;font-size:18px&#125;&#125;</style><h2 data-id="heading-0">题目描述</h2>
<p><img src="https://p3-juejin.byteimg.com/tos-cn-i-k3u1fbpfcp/127585d3db74467dab0d1bba4e4cca5d~tplv-k3u1fbpfcp-zoom-1.image" alt loading="lazy" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p>
<h2 data-id="heading-1">解题思路（数学规律）</h2>
<ul>
<li>本题主要是寻找数学规律，通过暴力的方法肯定是超时的，下面就简单介绍下本题的解题思路，我认为核心还是在于理解将字符串拆分为不同位数的区间。</li>
</ul>
<ol>
<li>首先判断n在哪一个区间，区间的划分按照 1 - 9，10-99，100-999...</li>
<li>计算下标n在当前区间的哪一个</li>
<li>求出n下标对应的真实的数字</li>
<li>求出该真实数字的哪一位是我们最终要返回的结果</li>
</ol>
<h2 data-id="heading-2">公式</h2>
<div class="math math-display"><span class="katex-display"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><mi>n</mi><mtext>下标对应的真实数字</mtext><mo>=</mo><mtext>区间起始值</mtext><mo>+</mo><mtext>（区间第几个</mtext><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>）</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">/</mi><mtext>第几个区间</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">n下标对应的真实数字 = 区间起始值 + （区间第几个 - 1） / 第几个区间</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:0.68333em;vertical-align:0em;"></span><span class="mord mathnormal">n</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">下</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">标</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">对</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">应</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">的</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">真</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">实</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">数</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">字</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2777777777777778em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2777777777777778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:0.76666em;vertical-align:-0.08333em;"></span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">区</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">间</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">起</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">始</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">值</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2222222222222222em;"></span><span class="mbin">+</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2222222222222222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:0.76666em;vertical-align:-0.08333em;"></span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">（</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">区</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">间</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">第</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">几</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">个</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2222222222222222em;"></span><span class="mbin">−</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2222222222222222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:1em;vertical-align:-0.25em;"></span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">）</span><span class="mord">/</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">第</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">几</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">个</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">区</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">间</span></span></span></span></span></div>
<div class="math math-display"><span class="katex-display"><span class="katex"><span class="katex-mathml"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML" display="block"><semantics><mrow><mtext>真实数字的哪一位</mtext><mo>=</mo><mtext>（区间第几个</mtext><mo>−</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>）</mtext><mi mathvariant="normal">%</mi><mtext>第几个区间取余</mtext></mrow><annotation encoding="application/x-tex">真实数字的哪一位 = （区间第几个 - 1）\% 第几个区间取余</annotation></semantics></math></span><span class="katex-html" aria-hidden="true"><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:0.68333em;vertical-align:0em;"></span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">真</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">实</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">数</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">字</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">的</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">哪</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">一</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">位</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2777777777777778em;"></span><span class="mrel">=</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2777777777777778em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:0.76666em;vertical-align:-0.08333em;"></span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">（</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">区</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">间</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">第</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">几</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">个</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2222222222222222em;"></span><span class="mbin">−</span><span class="mspace" style="margin-right:0.2222222222222222em;"></span></span><span class="base"><span class="strut" style="height:0.80556em;vertical-align:-0.05556em;"></span><span class="mord">1</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">）</span><span class="mord">%</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">第</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">几</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">个</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">区</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">间</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">取</span><span class="mord cjk_fallback">余</span></span></span></span></span></div>
<h2 data-id="heading-3">解题代码</h2>
<pre><code class="hljs language-js copyable" lang="js"><span class="hljs-keyword">var</span> findNthDigit = <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span>(<span class="hljs-params">n</span>) </span>&#123;
    <span class="hljs-comment">// 这里的n是下标</span>
    <span class="hljs-comment">// 如果下标小于10，直接返回n即可</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> (n < <span class="hljs-number">10</span>) &#123;
        <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> n;
    &#125;
    <span class="hljs-comment">// 走到这里，说明n大于等于10，如果大于等于10，则要首先判断在下标n在哪个区间</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> numInterval = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> (<span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> i = <span class="hljs-number">1</span>; i < <span class="hljs-number">100</span>; i++) &#123;
        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span> ((n - <span class="hljs-number">9</span>) < <span class="hljs-number">9</span> * <span class="hljs-built_in">Math</span>.pow(<span class="hljs-number">10</span>,i) * (i+<span class="hljs-number">1</span>)) &#123;
            numInterval = i+<span class="hljs-number">1</span>;
            <span class="hljs-keyword">break</span>;
        &#125; 
    &#125;
    <span class="hljs-comment">// 计算下标n  在当前区间的第几个  </span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">for</span> (<span class="hljs-keyword">let</span> i = <span class="hljs-number">0</span>; i < numInterval-<span class="hljs-number">1</span>; i++) &#123;
        n = n - <span class="hljs-number">9</span> * (<span class="hljs-number">10</span> ** i) * (i+<span class="hljs-number">1</span>);
    &#125;
    <span class="hljs-comment">// n所指向的下标对应的真实的数字 = 区间起始值 + （区间第几个 - 1） / 第几个区间</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> trueNum = <span class="hljs-number">10</span> ** (numInterval - <span class="hljs-number">1</span>) + <span class="hljs-built_in">parseInt</span>( (n - <span class="hljs-number">1</span>) / numInterval )
    <span class="hljs-comment">// 真实的数字可能是一个多位数，但是题目要求返回的是下标指向的一个数字，所以下标指向的一个数字就是 </span>
    <span class="hljs-comment">// (区间第几个 - 1) % 第几个区间</span>
    <span class="hljs-keyword">const</span> numIndex = (n - <span class="hljs-number">1</span>) % numInterval;
    <span class="hljs-keyword">return</span> <span class="hljs-built_in">String</span>(trueNum)[numIndex]
&#125;;
<span class="copy-code-btn">复制代码</span></code></pre>
<h2 data-id="heading-4">总结（本题给我们的启示思路）</h2>
<ul>
<li>启示：学会通过数学规律来求解问题</li>
</ul></div>  
</div>
